div.p: … in Egyptian “Kneph” … but in Greek, “Great(?) Modeler” … And having modeled two bulls equal … and their natures masculine, and … And having formed another design … the body of a snake that has not (one head?), but at each end … heads of men … heads of geese … of golden beaks having(?) … them with the shapes … with the body of a [….] and the face of a sea(?)hawk … in Egyptian “Eē…” subtle interpretations(?). Translation: from GEMF
